productslist.name: Men's Trekking Shirt
productslist.description: The backpacker-designers have created this shirt for travelling the world on foot for days at a time with complete peace of mind.. It is strong and practical, an ideal solution for winter and summer alike, for trips into town and outdoor adventures!

productslist.name: Men's Travel Shirt

productslist.name: Elite o-shirt
productslist.description: TRUE STORY MEN’S ELITE O-SHIRT is made for those who spend a lot of time training around forests. This orienteering shirt has a perfect ergonomic shape and it’s specially designed for orienteers, but we recommend it also for runners. The whole back is made from a mesh fabric to ensure the best possible cooling during your run. The top has a short zipper and low collar all around.
